location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.8 of 1851 from Lt Frederick Erskine Manners, Brigantine Tigris, to Commodore John Patterson Porter, Commanding Indian Naval Squadron, Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a report on the Tigris'spatrol of the Qatar coast. Manners reports that Afeerat [Fuwairit] was almost deserted, as was Wukruh [al-Wakra], and that most inhabitants of these towns had moved to Ed Biddeh [al Bidda]. Manners reports that he met the three sheikhs of Fuwairit, al-Wakra and Doha at al Bidda, but did not demand payment from them because of the financial security put up by the Sheikh of Bahrain (f 37). Manner also reports that he conducted surveys of the bay at Al Bidda while there.
